entry.title: 多种方法解决删除数组中不满足条件的对象或者元素
entry.content: $.grep() 1234567891011121314 var arr=[ {num:0,name:'1'}, {num:1,name:'2'}, {num:0,name:'3'}, {num:3,name:'4'}, {num:0,name:'5'},]arr=$.grep(arr,function(item,i){//item:数组元素；i:元素索引值 if(item.num!==0){ return item; }})console.log(arr);//[{num:1,name:'2'},{num:3,name:'4'}] for循环

entry.title: 全选/全不选
entry.content: js 12345678910111213141516InitSelectBox();function InitSelectBox(){ $('#select option').remove();//清空select里面数据 var arr=[ {id:0,opt:'1opt'}, {id:1,opt:'2opt'}, {id:2,opt:'3opt'}, {id:3,opt:'4opt'}, {id:4,opt:'5opt'}, ] $('#select').prepend('<option value="0">请选择</option>') for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){ $('#select').append('<option>'+arr[i].opt+'</option>'); }} html 123456789101112131415161718 .selBox{ width:200px; height:100px; border: 1px solid grey; padding: 10px;} <div class="selBox"><select style="width:80%;height:30px;" id='select'> <!-- <option value=''></option> <option value='1'>1</option> <option value='2'>2</option> <option value='3'>3</option> <option value='4'>4</option> --></select> </div>

entry.title: 弹框关闭的方法--点击弹框以外的部分，弹框消失
entry.content: 12345678910111213141516171819/*当用户点击DIV内容之外的区域，DIV也会关闭*/$(document).on('click',function(e){ if( $("弹出框").css('display')==="none"){ return; } var e = e||window.event;//浏览器兼容性 ，IE为window.event var elem=e.target||e.srcElement;//IE为e.srcElement if(elem.className==='按钮的类名'){ return; } while(elem){ if(elem.className&&elem.className==='弹出框类名'){ return; } elem=elem.parentNode; } $('弹出框').css('display','none'); //点击的不是div或其子元素});

entry.title: bootstrap-table
entry.content: bootstrap-table的使用以及工具栏的使用

entry.title: 使用bootstrap-datetimepicker设置时间查询区间，查询时间由今天开始，开始时间要在结束时间之前
entry.content: 参考百度bootstrap-datetimepicker——链接 html123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627<div class="well"><div class="row"> <div class="form-group has-feedback"> <label class="col-xs-2 col-lg-1 control-label">创建时间</label> <div class="col-xs-4 col-lg-3"> <div class="input-group date datepicker1"> <input type="text" class="form-control" name="beginTime" readonly> <span class="input-group-addon"> <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> </span> </div> </div> <label class="col-xs-2 col-lg-1 control-label" style="text-align: center;">至</label> <div class="col-xs-4 col-lg-3"> <div class="input-group date datepicker2"> <input type="text" class="form-control" name="endTime" readonly> <span class="input-group-addon"> <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar"></i> </span> </div> </div> </div> </div></div> ` 引入：1234567<script src="../../libs/jquery/jquery-2.1.1.min.js"></script><script src="../../libs/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script><script src="../../libs/bootstrap-datetimepicker/bootstrap-datetimepicker.js"></script><script src="../../libs/bootstrap-datetimepicker/bootstrap-datetimepicker.zh-CN.js"></script> js： 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768<script type="text/javascript">$(function(){ /**格式化时间格式**/ Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) { var o = { "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 "d+": this.getDate(), //日 "h+": this.getHours(), //小时 "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 }; if(/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length)); for (var k in o) if(new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length === 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length))); return fmt; }; /***日期插件 bootstrap-datetimepicker,时间联动**/ var startDate=new Date(0).Format("yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss"); $(".datepicker1").datetimepicker({ language: 'zh-CN', weekStart: 1, todayBtn: 1, autoclose: 1, todayHighlight: 1, startView: 2, minView: 0, pickerPosition: 'bottom-left', format: 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii:ss', forceParse: 0, clearBtn:true, endDate: new Date() }).on('change', function (e) { var input1Value=$('.hasDatepicker1 input').val(); if(input1Value!=''){ $('.hasDatepicker2').datetimepicker('setStartDate', input1Value); }else{ $('.hasDatepicker2').datetimepicker('setEndDate', new Date()); $('.hasDatepicker2').datetimepicker('setStartDate',startDate); } }); $(".datepicker2").datetimepicker({ language: 'zh-CN', weekStart: 1, todayBtn: 1, autoclose: 1, todayHighlight: 1, startView: 2, minView: 0, pickerPosition: 'bottom-left', format: 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii:ss', forceParse: 0, clearBtn:true, endDate: new Date() }).on('change', function (e) { var input2Value=$('.hasDatepicker2 input').val(); if(input2Value!='') { $('.hasDatepicker1').datetimepicker('setEndDate', input2Value); }else{ $('.hasDatepicker1').datetimepicker('setEndDate', new Date()); } });});

entry.title: echarts图表的使用
entry.content: 一、环状图、饼图参考百度echarts——链接 代码配置如下： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657app.title = '环形图';option={ tooltip: { trigger: 'item', formatter: "{a} <br/>{b}: {c} ({d}%)"},//鼠标悬浮显示信息legend: { orient: 'vertical', x: 'left', data:['A','B','C','D','E']},//左上角标题title:{ subtext:'总数量', text:'11', x:'center', y:'45%' },//环状图中间部分显示的文本series: [ { name:'访问来源', type:'pie', radius: ['30%', '40%'],//中心大小 center: ['50%', '50%'],//改变位置左-右-上-下 avoidLabelOverlap: false, label: { normal: { formatter: '{b}:{c}\n({d}%)',//引导线显示格式 textStyle : { fontWeight : 'normal', fontSize : 15//引导线字体大小 } }, emphasis: { show: true, textStyle: { fontSize: '30', fontWeight: 'bold' } }//鼠标悬浮在上面字体和图表放大 }, labelLine: { normal: { show: true } },//true:显示引导线 data:[ {value:335, name:'A'}, {value:310, name:'B'}, {value:234, name:'C'}, {value:135, name:'D'}, {value:1548, name:'E'} ]//数据可从后台获取，以arr.push(value:XXX;name:XXX)格式。legend的data按照以上格式; }]} 二、柱状图与曲线图结合参考百度echarts——链接 代码配置如下： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101app.title = '柱状图与折线图结合';var barOption = { tooltip: { trigger: 'axis', axisPointer: { type: 'cross', crossStyle: { color: '#999' } } }, toolbox: { feature: { dataView: {show: true, readOnly: false}, magicType: {show: true, type: ['line', 'bar']}, restore: {show: true}, saveAsImage: {show: true} } }, legend: { data:['AAAA','BBBB','CCCC','DDDD'] }, xAxis: [ { type: 'category', data: ['2018-06-01','2018-06-02','2018-06-03','2018-06-04','2018-06-05','2018-06-06','2018-06-07','2018-06-08','2018-06-09','2018-06-10','2018-06-11','2018-06-12','2018-06-13','2018-06-14','2018-06-15','2018-06-16','2018-06-17','2018-06-18','2018-06-19','2018-06-20','2018-06-21','2018-06-22','2018-06-23','2018-06-24','2018-06-25','2018-06-26','2018-06-27','2018-06-28','2018-06-29','2018-06-30'],//data可由后台返回 axisPointer: { type: 'shadow' } } ], yAxis: [ { type: 'value', name: '工单数量/条', min: 0, max: 250, interval: 50, axisLabel: { formatter: '{value}' } }, { type: 'value', name: '百分比%', min: 0, max: 25, interval: 5, axisLabel: { formatter: '{value}' } } ], series: [ { name:'AAAA', type:'bar', data:[2.0, 4.9, 7.0, 23.2, 25.6, 76.7, 135.6, 162.2, 32.6, 20.0, 48.4, 3.3,2.0, 125.9, 56.0, 23.2, 25.6, 76.7, 135.6, 162.2, 32.6, 20.0, 6.4, 3.3,2.0, 4.9, 7.0, 23.2, 25.6, 76.7], itemStyle:{ normal:{ color:'#F22E2D'//自定义颜色 } } }, { name:'BBBB', type:'bar', data:[2.6, 5.9, 9.0, 26.4, 28.7, 70.7, 175.6, 182.2, 48.7, 18.8, 61.0, 150.3,.625, 52.9, 94.0, 126.4, 28.7, 70.7, 175.6, 182.2, 48.7, 18.8, 6.0, 2.3,2.6, 5.9, 9.0, 26.4, 28.7, 70.7], itemStyle:{ normal:{ color:'#FCD64E' } } }, { name:'CCCC', type:'bar', data:[2.3, 4.9, 6.0, 18.4, 20.7, 56.7, 120.6, 162, 40.7, 20.8, 16.0, 75.3,102.3, 121.9, 6.0, 18.4, 20.7, 56.7, 120.6, 162, 40.7, 20.8, 16.0, 5.3,2.3, 4.9, 6.0, 18.4, 20.7, 56.7], itemStyle:{ normal:{ color:'#2BD75E' } } }, { name:'DDDD', type:'line', smooth:true, //这个是把折线变成曲线 yAxisIndex: 1, data:[2.0, 2.2, 3.3, 4.5, 6.3, 10.2, 20.3, 23.4, 23.0, 16.5, 12.0, 16.2,18.0, 16.2, 18.3, 16.5, 6.3, 10.2, 20.3, 23.4, 23.0, 16.5, 12.0, 6.2,2.0, 2.2, 3.3, 4.5, 6.3, 10.2], itemStyle:{ normal:{ color:'#4BBAFB' } } } ]}; 三、初始化方法（首先引入jquery、bootstrap包；echarts包等） html: 1<div id="echarts"></div> js:1234567891011121314151617181920212223全局的：var eCharts;InitEcharts();function InitEcharts(){ var eCharts=echarts.init(document.getElementById('echarts')); var newData=[]； //后台获取data数据，通过处理以 （{name:***,value:***,searchParam：***}）push到数据数组里newData中 var option={ ...(以上option配置) data:seriesAllData } eCharts.setOption(option);//重置option //点击每块区域跳转页面显示列表 eCharts.on("click",function(param){ var search=option.series[0].data[param.dataIndex].searchParam;//获取所点击区域标识作为参数 $(window).attr("location", "#/html页面地址"); //参数传递到另外一个页面需要cookie保存 searchSign={ searchValue:searchValue }//返回原页面需要将cookie置空document.cookie="searchSign="+""; $.cookie('searchSign',JSON.stringify(searchSign));//另外一个页面获取cookie }) return eCharts; } Annie Zhang的博客

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
